Uses of Class
org.forgerock.openam.notifications.Topic

  • Packages that use Topic 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement
    Defines classes to handle entitlements.
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.utils
    This package contains utility classes for entitlements.
    org.forgerock.openam.notifications
    Contains the notification api.
    org.forgerock.openam.notifications.brokers
    Contains NotificationBroker implementations.
    org.forgerock.openam.notifications.integration.brokers
    Contains OpenAM-specific NotificationBroker implementations.

      Methods in org.forgerock.openam.notifications with parameters of type Topic 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Subscription Subscription.bindTo​(Topic topic)
      Updates the subscription to receive notifications for the given topic.
      boolean Subscription.isBoundTo​(Topic topic)
      Determines whether the subscription is bound to the given topic.
      boolean NotificationBroker.publish​(Topic topic, org.forgerock.json.JsonValue notification)
      Publish passes the notification onto subscribers of the topic.
      Subscription Subscription.unbindFrom​(Topic topic)
      Updates the subscription to stop receiving notifications for the given topic.
